titles.title: A bill to authorize the honorary promotion of Colonel Charles E. McGee to brigadier general in the United States Air Force.
A bill to authorize the honorary promotion of Colonel Charles E. McGee to brigadier general in the United States Air Force.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to issue an honorary commission promoting Air Force Colonel Charles E. McGee (retired) to brigadier general.
